question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
answer: Kota Bogoras, esantis Indonezijoje, vadinamas "lietaus miestu" dėl savo itin didelio kritulių kiekio ištisus metus.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor in Indonesia is known as the "rain city" because of its extremely high rainfall throughout the year.
